title: About me
description: Hey, I'm {{config.owner.fullName}}, a fourth-year Bachelor's student of Computer Science at Inholland University of Applied Sciences in Haarlem, The Netherlands. I have a passion for problem solving and like to dive deep into complex issues. I'm always eager to learn new things and improve my skills.

I have experience with various programming languages and technologies, such as Java, C#, TypeScript, Python, and (No)SQL. I'm also familiar with frameworks and libraries like React, Spring Boot, ASP.NET, and TensorFlow. I'm currently working on expanding my knowledge of CI/CD and Cloud Computing.

backendDevelopment.title: Backend Development
backendDevelopment.description: Building backend systems and API's for various applications

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Developing functional websites built with modern technologies.

artificialIntelligence.title: Artificial Intelligence
artificialIntelligence.description: Creating both machine and deep learning AI models.

cooking.title: Cooking
cooking.description: Besides programming, I love to cook and try new recipes.

marcDierikx.name: Marc Dierikx
marcDierikx.position: Chief Technology Officer at S.P. Abonneeservice BV
description: Sem joined us as an intern on a project where he could work as a full stack developer.
He turned out to be a very nice and incredibly driven and motivated student who needed to be slowed down rather than stimulated.
He is good at turning functional ideas into technical designs, mock-ups and proof-of-concept setups.
He is also very good at putting himself in the shoes of the end users of the software. This not only creates a technically well-functioning system, but also a system with a pleasant user interface.

In addition, during a project there are always unforeseen situations that are more difficult to solve. Sem is someone who in such a situation certainly does not give up, but instead looks for alternatives.
All in all a very good addition to our IT department.

tayamElJebari.name: Tayam El Jebari
tayamElJebari.position: Fellow student | DevOps Engineer bij Albert Heijn
description: I have enjoyed working with Sem. Sem has a good ability to take initiative in various tasks and has a serious approach with his responsibilities.

His communication skills are excellent, which always makes cooperation within the team run smoothly. His dedication and diligence always leads to a clear structure in his code. Sem is also an upbeat and fun colleague to work with. His positive attitude contributes to a pleasant working atmosphere.
